name: Madness Cubed
summary:
Build, Dig, Protect! Is the base being attacked by hordes of zombies, demons and robots? No problem, because we have more than 40 guns, turrets, tanks, ATVs, helicopters, infantry fighting vehicles, entire wardrobes of super armor and skins in our arsenal! The online shooter becomes an exciting survival battle, with the destruction of the map, the construction of defense structures, mechanisms and traps. Build with friends, build maps for survival, capture the flag and assault modes, play on maps of friends and earn general epaulettes!
In addition to the online battle, you will find 8 episodes of 12 missions to complete, during which you will protect cities from the zombie apocalypse, unite against powerful bosses, look for lost technologies, survive in laboratories and much more!
Join the Madness Cubed Liberation Army!
